app/public/vendor/bows/build.js
var browserify = require('browserify'), fs = require('fs'), uglify = require("uglify-js"); var b = browserify({ standalone: 'bows' }); b.add('./bows.js'); b.bundle(function (error, code) { fs.writeFileSync('./dist/bows.js', code); //Uglify var min_code = uglify.minify('./dist/bows.js').code; fs.writeFileSync('./dist/bows.min.js', min_code); });
